name: Broccoli Cheddar Chicken Casserole
description: As the days grow shorter and the air crispier, there’s nothing quite like a cozy, satisfying casserole. With their rich and hearty layers, casseroles are the epitome of comfort and warmth. Whether it’s Thanksgiving, Christmas, or just a regular weeknight, this one-pot wonder is super hands-off so you can spend less time in the kitchen and more time with family and friends.
preparation: Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat; add chicken and seasoning. Cook until browned, 3–4 min.
Add broccoli, broth, carrots, rice, and butter to pan; bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer 20 min, until liquid is taken up and rice is almost cooked.
Stir in 1⁄2 cup cheese and milk. Sprinkle remaining 1⁄2 cup cheese over top.
Transfer pan to oven. Bake 15 min, until cheese is melted and starting to brown.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
